doc.file: Ooh!... I can read it on your face. You're going to love it here in Pelican Town.#$b#If you're ever looking for something to do in the evening, stop by the saloon. That's where I work! #!String Oh, I like this place! It's full of parrots! #!String Ah... my lungs feel perfect. #!String Can you feel it? The ocean has a profound healing energy. #!String Are you having fun, @? You need to remember to take breaks now and then too! #!String It's nice to be on this side of the bar for once!$h #!String If you open your heart to the sun, you can feel a loving energy inside of you.$h #!String %Emily is lost in the music. #!String I'm very sorry... but I've already agreed to dance with someone else.$u #!String @... You broke my heart... I just can't talk to you anymore.$s#$e#Please, let me try to heal...$s #!String ...$s #!String B...But I thought we had a special bond... *sniff*$s #!String Oh, that's beautiful... I have a friend who would love that! But she lives far from here... #!String @... I'm ready to give you a second chance. I still have faith that there's a good person inside of you.$s #!String Have I told you Haley and I are sisters? Strange, isn't it? #!String I have a secret hobby, but I won't say any more.#$e#Maybe I'll show you some day.$h #!String This world is full of spirits and magic... Some don't believe me, but I know it's true.#$e#I can see it in your eyes... you believe in the other world, like me. #!String I wish Haley would get a job or at least contribute to cooking and cleaning.$s#$e#I think she's hoping to marry someone rich.$u #!String I have to say, now that Haley's gone I've had a much easier time keeping things in order. #!String There's good people in this town who just can't seem to find happiness. It makes me sad.$u#$e#Working in the saloon, I hear first-hand about everyone's problems.$u #!String I work part-time at Gus' saloon. It pays the bills. #!String I'm just working at Gus' to make ends meet... but my real passion is tailoring.$u#$e#I made these clothes from scratch, see? #!String Oh, hi... It's nice of you to visit me like this.$h #!String You know, @... I think the future looks bright for both of us. #!String I've heard rumors of rare and powerful magic rings, forged long ago by forgotten civilizations. I'm not sure if it's true or just a fairy tale. #!String You catch fish? I just hope you treat the poor things humanely.$s#$e#Every critter deserves our respect, even the slimy ones. #!String Have faith... every day you're taking one more step on the path of your destiny. #!String Hi, @.$u#$e#I always knew we'd become close like this... #!String I hope you're farming in a sustainable way. The valley's ecosystem is fragile!#$e#How do I know? I have a strong gut-feeling! #!String Sometimes the flowers speak to me... each one has a different story to tell! #!String Ah, spring. The season of pastels. I actually prefer jewel tones, myself.#$b#Oh, excuse me! I was mumbling about fashion again, wasn't I? #!String I like making my own clothes, but it's not easy to get cloth.#$e#And it's such a long trip to the city. #!String Do you ever think about the texture of fabric, @? Each texture has a distinct personality... feel my dress... see? #!String Hi @!#$e#Do you raise sheep in your barn? You can turn their wool into beautiful bolts of cloth!#$e#You'll need a loom, though. You can make them yourself if you know the crafting recipe. #!String This house was left in our care by my parents. They've been traveling the world for the last two years.#$e#We have no idea when they'll be back.#$e#I enjoy living here, though. It's a beautiful area and the town is nice. #!String Thank you! #!String Um... Okay. Sorry you didn't like it. I guess those three years of practice were a complete waste...$s #!String Did you really think so? That's exactly the effect I was shooting for!$h#$b#I'm so glad you liked it. #!String Haley is a picky eater. It's so hard to cook for her. #!String Eating healthy is very important to me. I want to live a long and active life. #!String Haley and I get along much better now that she's moved out. I look forward to her visits! #!String Hello there, @.#$e#I feel lazy today.$u #!String I feel bad for Linus. People judge him, but he's just living a different lifestyle.$u#$e#I wish everyone could learn to be accepting of others. #!String Hi, @! We've become decent friends, haven't we?$h#$e#That's fine with me. You're a cool guy.^I'm glad.$h #!String Hi, @! We've become decent friends, haven't we?$h#$e#This may sound weird, but I've always been certain this would happen. #!String It doesn't rain much in summer, does it?#$e#That just means more watering work for you, huh?#$e#Or do you enjoy the sunny weather? #!String I consider the bees and butterflies to be my special friends! #!String If I wasn't so busy I'd come help you on the farm!#$e#But Gus would be upset if I had another job...$s #!String You know, I'm sure Gus would understand if I wanted to leave the Saloon someday.#$b#There's so much out there, I can't stay a barmaid forever.$u #!String Don't overwork yourself or you might end up in Harvey's clinic! #!String Hi @! #!String It's around this time of year that my good friends visit the region... I mean the parrots! #!String Well, fall is here. Time to plant some new crops, huh? #!String It's good weather for a picnic, isn't it? #!String If I didn't have to work I'd suggest we go on a nice picnic! #!String Hello. Did you have a good summer? #!String Hi @! I bet your farm did great this past summer, huh?#$e#You're an excellent farmer.$h #!String My friend runs a shop in the desert. If you ever go there stop in and say hi for me.#$e#I think she sells some rare products. #!String Are you friends with Clint? He's a nice guy, if you get to know him.#$e#He gets lonely working in his shop all day. But he's so shy he has trouble making new friends. #!String I think Clint's mad at me. He never looks at me anymore...$u#$e#I always thought we were friends.$u #!String Another beautiful fall day.#$e#It's a pity it'll soon be over. #!String Smell that clean air? It's lovely, isn't it?#$b#I just fear that the Joja Co.'s of the world will take this away from us.$u #!String Keep your mind open and some interesting things might take root.#$e#Anyway, how is your day going? #!String I don't have any huge plans for life. I prefer not to stress about the future. #!String Nothing like a sunny sunday to lift the spirits! #!String There's so many invisible barriers holding us back. Why can't people learn to let go and celebrate freedom?#$e#Me? Well, you know what they say... 'You can't cage a wild Junimo'. #!String You're such a nice person, @! Thanks for being my friend.$h #!String Be careful an icicle doesn't fall on your head! #!String Be careful an icicle doesn't fall on your head! I wouldn't want you to get hurt! #!String Oh, hello @!$h#$e#You must be getting very good at farming by now, huh? #!String I bet you're an excellent farmer by now! #!String I think my hair is frozen solid...$s #!String Haley and I aren't made for such a big house. It's a hassle to keep it clean.#$e#Ah well. I really shouldn't be complaining.#$e#Your farmhouse seems nice and cozy.$h #!String It must be so cold for the poor fish.$s#$e#I wonder if any fish hibernate? Maybe I should ask Demetrius. #!String If I wasn't so busy I'd help you dig around in that cave by the lake.#$e#I bet there are some powerful crystals inside there. #!String Do you know how to cook 'Bean Hotpot'?#$e#I like that dish quite a bit.$h%revealtasteEmily207#$e#It's hard to get fresh ingredients in the winter, huh? #!String Hi!#$e#...Yes? #!String My sister and I might fight sometimes, but I would really miss her if she left.#$e#I think she'll become a very nice young lady some day... Don't tell her I said that.$h#$e#So, is there anything you want to talk about? #!String Say hi to my sister for me! And remind her to visit me tomorrow. #!String

I wonder where the flying insects go when it rains? Don't they get hit by the raindrops? #!String A day like this is a blessing from mother nature. #!String Good morning... I got this gift for you. Don't worry, I already purified it with sage incense. [428 440 444 338 207] #!String I meant to let the parrot go free, but his wing never fully healed. He seems content, though. I give him lots of attention.#$e#He told me that he's happy here. #!String I never told you this... but when you first moved here I had a dream about you. I knew right then that our life-paths would intertwine.$4 #!String Every moment has a unique and precious beauty... do you notice? It can be easy to forget, sometimes. #!String This is my favorite spot for a morning meditation.#$e#I visualize the energy from this crystal garden flowing through my body. #!String I can hear the plants talking to each other... they're so happy after today's rain! #!String How was your day, @? You look a little soggy. #!String My day was very peaceful. How was yours? #!String Want some dessert? It's my special raw, gluten-free version, sweetened only with cactus syrup.[232 234 223 220]$h #!String Does the sound of rain ever put you in a trance? #!String Another beautiful day on %farm farm... I have faith that something good will happen today!$h #!String Here, take this. It's for you. [428 440 444 338 207 395 749] #!String Hey, someone must've gotten a good night of sleep... you look fresh this morning.$h #!String My horoscope for the day isn't too good... but I'm going to make the best of it, as always. Let's get to work! #!String Ughh... *gurgle*... I ate too many bran muffins for breakfast.$s #!String Is that a new hole I see in your shirt? I can sew that up for you, no problem. #!String Welcome home, @. I hope you had a wonderful day. #!String Is it bed time already? My, the day just floated away from me again.$u #!String Ah, that aroma! It can only be you.$h#$e#It's a good smell. #!String I swept the whole house, washed the windows, dusted, and cleaned the fridge. It was a very productive day! #!String I love getting up early. There's a certain freshness to the air and the wildlife is much more active. #!String What's on the agenda today, dear? #!String Oooh! Ooh! I saw another one!$h#$e#I'm counting squirrels. #!String A little sunlight is good for you. Just don't get crispy, okay? #!String Good morning! I was wondering when you'd finally roll out of bed!$h#$e#It's okay, @... you deserve a good night of rest. #!String I hope we can raise %kid1 to be kind and considerate. That's more important than getting A's in school. #!String Is one child enough, or should we raise another?#$e#I guess we'll just see where fate leads us. #!String I lit a pale green candle and shook a sprig of baby-mint over %kid1. That should ward off any dangerous spirits. #!String A big house, two kids and a parrot... I have my hands full! #!String Well, %kid2 certainly has your hair...$u #!String Oh, I already fed the kids their organic quinoa puffs with goat milk. You just focus on the farm! #!String This is so fun to live together! I always thought I'd be single my whole life. #!String It was our destiny to be together... I believe that with all my heart! #!String Thanks for taking me into your home. I love this new life.$4 #!String Our vibrational energies are perfectly in tune. Can't you feel it? #!String I was just admiring my wedding amulet... The shell is beautiful! I can feel the pure blue energy radiating from it.$l #!String I had another dream about us last night. We had climbed to the top of a crystal tree, looking down on the most lush and beautiful meadow. I keep having this dream.#$e#I don't know what it means, but I feel that it's a good omen. #!String I hope you'll still like me when I grow old and my hair turns to a dull, faded steel. #!String I feel uninspired today.$s #!String I'm going to visit town today, and later on I'm going to help out at the saloon. Have a nice day. #!String My day went well... it's good to get out of the house now and then. #!String My friends, the plants, have come back to life. I feel content. #!String Happy new year, honey. Let's make this a special one.$4 #!String Hmm... I'm thinking maybe a salad of fresh foraged greens for dinner tonight? #!String The energy in our bodies fluctuate just as the seasons do. Understanding your own unique rhythym is the first step to inner harmony. #!String May Yoba bless you on this lovely day.$7 #!String The year's already half-way over. Can you believe it? #!String Our bodies are naturally in tune with the seasons. This light and color of fall compels us to prepare for the barren winter.#$e#To our distant ancestors, this feeling was encompassing and vital. For us, it only barely peeks through the noise of modern life. #!String On a day like this, I have a craving for cinnamon, nutmeg, clove, and cardamom. #!String *sigh*... Why does there have to be war and hatred in the world?$s #!String I can't help but think of all the poor, frozen squirrels out there right now.$s #!String I'm feeling excited for a new year of farming, @!$h #!String I drank a super-food smoothie this morning and I feel aaah-mazing!$h #!String Phew! It's hot but it feels great, doesn't it?#$e#Maybe we'll see some wild parrots today. #!String Whoops, my hair is frozen solid again.$s #!String I'm going to spend some time with the parrot today. It breaks my heart that he'll never fly again.$u #!String
